description: Winger Antony will be available for Real Betis' La Liga match against Real Madrid on Saturday after winning an appeal against a red card.
title: Real Betis: Antony free to face Real Madrid after winning red card appeal
title_page: Real Betis: Antony free to face Real Madrid after winning red card appeal - BBC Sport
